COMMENT_TX: $Debut for Tom Long; his only career appearance
It started to rain in the 4th inning and lasted into the 7th
$HP Umpire Jack Powell warned the Braves bench for criticizing his decisions

ej,bancd101,M,powej901,Balls and strikes ej,stenc101,P,powej901,Balls and strikes ej,power101,P,powej901,Balls and strikes $Braves Manager Dave Bancroft, Ray Powell and Casey Stengel ejected by HP umpire Jack Powell
ej,mckeb101,M,mccob104,Balls and strikes $Pirates Manager Bill McKechnie ejected by HP umpire Barry McCormick for arguing the first strike called on Max Carey
$Charlie Grimm left with a Charley horse
heavy rain started falling in the fifth
Game called for rain in bottom of the eighth inning
$Jack Fournier returned to 3B where Milt Stock had advanced
Jimmy Johnston left game with injured ankle
Start of game delayed 20 minutes due to light drizzle; it rained throughout the game
$Gus Sandberg's grounder hit Umpire Charlie Moran
ej,grimb101,P,wilsf901,Call at 1B $Burleigh Grimes ejected by 1B umpire Frank Wilson when he continued to argue pickoff call from previous inning
$over the RF wall and into Bedford Avenue

$Game called on account of rain; as they entered the eighth, the skies were dark and rain was imminent; the following events are from the top of the eighth:  Youngs doubled; Frisch RBI single and he advanced to 2B on an error by Brown; Wilson stuck out; with Kelly at bat the rain came down hard; HR Umpire Klem could not see the players and he was getting drenched, so he called the game; the score reverted to previous inning
$Overflow crowd with many people placed behind ropes in outfield so many ground rule doubles were hit
Weather: beastly hot with rumbling clouds coming over from New Jersey
Rain began to fall and lasted through the 9th
$seven consecutive strike outs by Dazzy Vance
$caromed off Bob Barrett's glove; he recovered but threw past Vic Aldridge, who was late covering 1B; Barrett recovered the ball near the dugout and threw wildly to HP and into the other dugout
$Bernie Neis muffed the fly but got the force
$pop fly fell behind 2B; runners had to hold up
ej,stuaj101,P,odayh101,Balls and strikes $Johnny Stuart ejected by HP Umpire Hank O'Day

$the return throw to HP was in time but Eddie Moore hopped over Hank DeBerry, eluding the tag (according to Ump Pfirman); this brought a storm of protest from DeBerry, Robins Manager Wilbert Robinson and the fans
ej,grimb101,P,pfic901,Bench jockeying $Burleigh Grimes ejected by HP Umpire Cy Pfirman; two pop bottles were thrown from the grandstand at Pfirman as he was returning to HP
$Bernie Friberg slid into 1B and left with a dislocated right ankle
$Mickey O'Neil dropped pop foul but HR Umpire Bill Klem declared Jimmy Johnston out for interference
